label: Financial records,
description: Financial records, 1915-1919, comprising contribution books, 1915-1918; fund accounts, 1915-1919; bank books, 1917-1919; and receipts and invoices, 1915-1919, from Cohen, Weenen & Co., Manufacturers and Importers of Tobacco, Cigars and Cigarettes, London, and various other tobacconists and confectioners from Aberystwyth.
attribution: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru â€“ The National Library of Wales

value.@value: This content has been digitised by The National Library of Wales
Digidwyd y cynnwys hwn gan Lyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru

members.label: Contribution books,
members.description: Records of contributions to the Fund, 1915-1918, including the names of contributors and the total donations received.

members.label: Fund accounts,
members.description: Weekly accounts, 1915-1919, comprising details of the Fund's receipts and disbursements, and records of the Christmas Gift Fund account, 1915-1916, noting the names and addresses of subscribers and the amounts donated.

members.label: Bank books,
members.description: Account book of Sergeant Major Fear with The London and Provincial Bank Ltd., 1917-1919, including a half-used paying-in book and stub.

members.label: Cohen, Weenen & Co. invoices,
members.description: Invoices received from Cohen, Weenen & Co. recording the brand and amount of tobacco and cigarettes sent to Aberystwyth soldiers, 1915, including their names, military numbers and addresses whilst on active service.

members.label: Cohen, Weenen & Co. invoices,
members.description: Invoices received from Cohen, Weenen & Co. recording the brand and amount of tobacco and cigarettes sent to Aberystwyth soldiers, 1916, including their names, military numbers and addresses whilst on active service.

members.label: Cohen, Weenen & Co. invoices,
members.description: Invoices received from Cohen, Weenen & Co. recording the brand and amount of tobacco and cigarettes sent to Aberystwyth soldiers, 1917, including their names, military numbers and addresses whilst on active service.

members.label: Cohen, Weenen & Co. invoices,
members.description: Invoices received from Cohen, Weenen & Co. recording the brand and amount of tobacco and cigarettes sent to Aberystwyth soldiers, 1918, including their names, military numbers and addresses whilst on active service.

members.label: Cohen, Weenen & Co. receipts,
members.description: Receipts received from Cohen, Weenen & Co., 1915-1916.

members.label: Receipts and invoices of purchases made in Aberystwyth,
members.description: Receipts and invoices of purchases made by the Fund from companies in Aberystwyth, 1915-1919, including the Cambrian News Printing Works and various bakers and confectioners.
